column6: authorities received information that a foreigner had died in a rented house in Snam Sey village
column9: Kampot province.------The victim was named as Juergen Friedrich  Schott
column11: of Germany.------ According to police and medical staff
column12: the cause of death was from disease of the liver.------The body was sent to an undisclosed location in Phnom Penh.
